name: Chuck Yeager's Advanced Flight Trainer
overview: The game features 14 different airplanes, 10 different viewpoints both inside and outside of the plane, with a zoom of up to 256x and different aerodynamics for each plane. You can do different things with the planes, from racing against a computer opponent, to practicing formation and stunt flights. There is a "black box recorder" to replay your flights, and analysis of your performance compared to an ideal one. The name was changed to "Chuck Yeager's Advanced Flight Trainer" after Microsoft threatened litigation.
